steps.description: Add a base image node to start your workflow.
Upload an image to the base image node.
Add a style node and select a style like 'Modern'.
Connect the base image to the style node.
Add an AI processor node and set a custom prompt.
Connect the style node to the AI processor.
Add a template node for a predefined layout.
Connect the AI processor to the template node.
Add an output node and connect the template to it.
Click 'Generate Visual' to see the result in the preview.
